text: Hot Water may refer to: *Hot Water (novel), a 1932 novel by P.G. Wodehouse *Hot Water (album), an album by Jimmy Buffett *"Hot Water" (song), a 1984 song by Level 42 *Hot Water (1924 film), feature film starring silent comedian Harold Lloyd *Hot Water (1937 film), 55-min American comedy directed by Frank R. Strayer *Hot Water, a 1978 film directed by Su Friedrich *"Hot Water" (American Dad!), a 2011 episode of American Dad!
title: Hot Water
